title: Old S4, Now B1, LF Duo partner/team for Normal/Ranked

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

body:
Been away from the game since the end of season 4. I worked my way into Silver div 4 and then stopped playing. I have recently returned and made silly mistakes in my 10 pre-ranked games and found myself in Bronze 1. 

I main support, can play adc ok. I am hoping to find silver players that want to duo, or a team looking for a sup player for either ranked or normal games. I am hoping to find a group or skilled person to help me get back into understanding this seasons meta and increase my mechanical skill in game.

I refuse to be carried and only ask for patience from those that play with me while i quickly learn the ropes again and enjoy the game.

replies.body:
i was b1 now back to b3 almost b4 if you want to duo add me
- Deep Sanity
hey im a silver 5 player, i too am looking for someone to play with :3 add me in game if you still need someone 8)

IGN: span
lets start a team!
I'm a top/mid/jungle Bronze 1 player! :3 Almost identical situation as you. Just started playing again. But no friends :s
